# PTSC Certificate Verification System

This is a static website project for Programming and Tech Skill Club (PTSC), KNIT Sultanpur certificate verification system.

## Project Structure
- index.html: Landing page with certificate ID/key input form
- certificate.html: Certificate display page with validation
- certificates.json: Certificate database (client-side)
- style.css: Responsive styling with PTSC branding
- script.js: Client-side validation and certificate rendering logic

## Technical Requirements
- Pure HTML/CSS/JavaScript (no frameworks)
- Client-side only (no backend/database)
- Mobile responsive design
- Printable certificate layout
- GitHub Pages compatible

## Features
- Certificate validation via ID and key pairs
- Professional certificate display with PTSC branding
- Social media sharing (Open Graph meta tags)
- Error handling for invalid certificates
- Offline functionality after initial load
